MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in The Beeches and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:18PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14 PM on Sunday, 13 December 2020
